definitions: the reduction of the sales of a company's own products as a consequence of its introduction of another similar product

examples.text: the launch of new versions of the tablet has resulted in sales cannibalization
marketing managers think a lot about product cannibalization

shortDefinitions: reduction of sales of company's own products as result of introduction of similar product

definitions: the eating of one animal by another member of the same species

examples.text: female cannibalization of the male insect can sometimes occur

shortDefinitions: eating of animal by another member of same species
